title: Little icons near a name
content:
What are those icons near some people's names?
like:[img]http://img179.imageshack.us/img179/8576/helmetrg4.gif[/img] and [img]http://img81.imageshack.us/img81/5817/spleenirv1.gif[/img]

title: Re: Little icons near a name
content:
They are something small (10x10 IIRK) icons and they can be set in "Use Personal Icon URL:" in Account Preferences.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."
